subject: Deadline Extended:: DigitalSec2014:: Czech Republic- Ostrava
from: "The International Conference on Digital Security and Forensics (DigitalSec2014)" <donotreply@sdiwc.us>
body:
Please Accept our Apology for Multiple Posting. THANK YOU. Kind Reminder:: CALL FOR PAPERS ============================================================== International Conference on Digital Security and Forensics (DigitalSec2014) June 24- 26, 2014 Ostrava, Czech Republic http://sdiwc.net/conferences/2014/digitsec2014/ ============================================================== The proposed conference aims to enable researchers build connections between different digital applications. The conference welcomes papers on the following (but not limited to) research topics: - Authentication and Access Control Systems - Biometrics Applications - Privacy issues - Secure Software Development, Architecture and Outsourcing - Security for Future Networks - Security in Cloud Computing - Security protocols - Computer Security - Formal Methods Application in Security - Hardware-Based security - Security in Social Networks - Security of Web-based Applications and Services - Multimedia and Document Security - Operating Systems and Database Security - Cyber-Crimes - Data leakage, Data protection and Database forensics - Evidentiary Aspects of Digital Forensics - Executable Content and Content Filtering - Distributed and Pervasive Systems Security - Enterprise Systems Security - Anti-cyberterrorism - Anti-Forensics and Anti-Anti-Forensics Techniques - Incident Handling and Penetration Testing - Legal Issues - File System and Memory Analysis Multimedia Forensic - Forensics of Virtual and Cloud Environments - Information Hiding - Investigation of Insider Attacks - Large-Scale Investigations - Malware forensics and Anti-Malware techniques - New threats and Non-Traditional approaches - Network Forensics and Traffic Analysis - Hardware Vulnerabilities and Device Forensics - Computer Forensics - Confidentiality Protection - Cryptography and Data Protection - Forensics, Recognition Technologies and Applications - Network Security - Business Continuity & Disaster Recovery Planning - Corporate Governance - Critical Infrastructure Protection - Decidability and Complexity - Digital Rights Management and Intellectual Property Protection - Economics of Security - Fraud Management - Identity Management - Laws and Regulations - Security Policies and Trust Management - Threats, Vulnerabilities, and Risk Management - Computer Crime Prevention and Detection - Biometrics standards and standardization - Cyber Peacefare Trends and Approaches - Electronic Passports, National ID and Smart Card Security - New theories and algorithms in biometrics - Social engineering - Surveillance Systems ================ IMPORTANT DATES: Submission Deadline: Submission is open Notification of Acceptance: 3 days from the submission date Camera Ready Submission: June 14, 2014 Registration: June 14, 2014 Conference Dates: June 24-26, 2014 ---------------------------------------- If you want to unsubscribe to this mail message from SDIWC, just follow this link http://sdiwc.us/Filemailer2/sdiwc-mailer/unsubscribe.php?id=d67fac30874ed23b1c8bf6f96d9f2cb5 Please Accept our Apology for Multiple Posting. THANK YOU.

Kind Reminder:: CALL FOR PAPERS
==============================================================

International Conference on Digital Security and Forensics
(DigitalSec2014)
June 24- 26, 2014
Ostrava, Czech Republic
http://sdiwc.net/conferences/2014/digitsec2014/
==============================================================
The proposed conference aims to enable researchers build connections between different digital applications.

The conference welcomes papers on the following (but not limited to) research topics:

- Authentication and Access Control Systems
- Biometrics Applications

- Privacy issues
- Secure Software Development, Architecture and Outsourcing

- Security for Future Networks
- Security in Cloud Computing

- Security protocols
- Computer Security

- Formal Methods Application in Security
- Hardware-Based security

- Security in Social Networks
- Security of Web-based Applications and Services

- Multimedia and Document Security
- Operating Systems and Database Security

- Cyber-Crimes
- Data leakage, Data protection and Database forensics

- Evidentiary Aspects of Digital Forensics
- Executable Content and Content Filtering

- Distributed and Pervasive Systems Security
- Enterprise Systems Security

- Anti-cyberterrorism
- Anti-Forensics and Anti-Anti-Forensics Techniques

- Incident Handling and Penetration Testing
- Legal Issues

- File System and Memory Analysis Multimedia Forensic
- Forensics of Virtual and Cloud Environments

- Information Hiding
- Investigation of Insider Attacks

- Large-Scale Investigations
- Malware forensics and Anti-Malware techniques

- New threats and Non-Traditional approaches
- Network Forensics and Traffic Analysis

- Hardware Vulnerabilities and Device Forensics
- Computer Forensics

- Confidentiality Protection
- Cryptography and Data Protection

- Forensics, Recognition Technologies and Applications
- Network Security

- Business Continuity & Disaster Recovery Planning
- Corporate Governance

- Critical Infrastructure Protection
- Decidability and Complexity

- Digital Rights Management and Intellectual Property Protection
- Economics of Security

- Fraud Management
- Identity Management

- Laws and Regulations
- Security Policies and Trust Management

- Threats, Vulnerabilities, and Risk Management
- Computer Crime Prevention and Detection

- Biometrics standards and standardization
- Cyber Peacefare Trends and Approaches

- Electronic Passports, National ID and Smart Card Security
- New theories and algorithms in biometrics

- Social engineering
- Surveillance Systems


================
IMPORTANT DATES:

Submission Deadline: Submission is open
Notification of Acceptance: 3 days from the submission date
Camera Ready Submission: June 14, 2014
Registration: June 14, 2014
Conference Dates: June 24-26, 2014
